author: draganrakita
content: Whats the difference between `_stable` and `_development` fixtures?

author: spencer_tb
content: Stable right now is Cancun downwards. Development is stable+ Prague.  Prague will be moved to stable at the hard fork & development will then include Osaka tests!

author: draganrakita
content: One more question, what do people thing about fixture git repo with all aggregated json's, it is easier for CI to fetch files from git repo than for me to bump local test folder with new fixtures?

author: chfast
content:
For CI we are happy to fetch tests from tar.gz. In our case we work with multiple sources anyway so the single git repo with everything will never work for us. I also try to convince Erigon to switch to fetching tests via URL instead of git submodule... In other words, evmone's documentation/spec what tests it supports and passes is the CI config and this works very well.

I will obviously don't oppose any other way to distributing tests, just wanted to share some good practice.

author: draganrakita
content: For CI we are happy to fetch tests from
